EmailTemplate.description: To be automatically sent when a new contact is created
EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Aboard!
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace - Introducing MyAerospace.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Getting the most from Honeywell with MyAerospace Introducing MyAerospace.com
Get what you need online, quickly and easily, 24x7 <http://www.myaerospace.com>
Get a price quote online <http://media.honeywell.com/MyAeroQuotes/index.htm>
Place an order <http://media.honeywell.com/MyAeroOnlineOrdering/index.htm>
Check your Order Status <http://media.honeywell.com/MyAeroOrderStatus/index.htm>
View Technical Publications <https://www51.honeywell.com/aero/portal/techpubs/tutorial/Technical_Publications_Tutorial.swf>
Find a Support Contact <https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal/aero/support>
Find a Dealer or Service Center <https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/wps/portal/aero/support/servicelocator>
Send a Product in for Repair <https://www51.honeywell.com/aero/portal/Common/Documents/Returns_Tool_Training_Summary.pdf>
To view all of the online applications MyAerospace offers, Download our Features Guide. <http://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/MyAerospace Features.pdf>
Need help getting started?
Follow this step by step guide <https://www51.honeywell.com/aero/portal/Common/Documents/myaerospace_userguide_registration_en.pdf>. Check additional training videos <https://commerce.honeywell.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/HonMultimediaTutorialsCategoryCmd?storeId=10651>.
Are you AOG? Please call us at 1-800-601-3099 or Int'l at 1-602-365-3099 or email us: aog@honeywell.com <mailto:aog@honeywell.com>
